ComicInfo.Title: The Little Fishy That Got Away
ComicInfo.Summary:
Nautical adventures on and under the high seas lead a cursed girl to mythic creatures, gnarled and crusty pirates, and ghostly apparitions in this new six-part series of thrilling swashbucklers, wonderland journeys, and unimagined dangers! Cursed Pirate Girl befriends the Governor's daughter Apollonia, as the two prepare to begin Cursed Pirate Girl's journey to be reunited with her own father. Unfortunately, Governor Maygun considers Cursed Pirate Girl to be a bad influence on his daughter, and hires a thug to take care of her permanently!
